title: Woman plays basketball with Globetrotters for 109th birthday
text:
Woman plays basketball with Globetrotters for 109th birthday 11:17am EST - 01:07 
Virginia McLaurin, who danced with Obama at the White House when she turned 106, celebrates her upcoming 109th birthday with the Harlem Globetrotters. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Virginia McLaurin, who danced with Obama at the White House when she turned 106, celebrates her upcoming 109th birthday with the Harlem Globetrotters. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2IbTeCq
